title: Sumanthiran agrees to lead forthcoming law reform committee
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe has engaged in a telephone conversation with TNA MP M.A. Sumanthiran, and the Prime Minister has inquired Sumanthiran whether he would support the Government under PM Wickremesinghe.
MP Sumanthiran has stated that he supports proposals to solve the problems of the people.
However, he had agreed to the proposal of PM Wickremesinghe to lead the forthcoming Law Reform Committee.
Nearly 90 arrested in connection with 9th May events: Police
